name: Alex Johnson
quote: This platform helped me save hundreds on textbooks!

name: Taylor Smith
quote: Super easy to use and great for finding deals.

name: Jordan Lee
quote: I sold all my old gear in one weekend!

name: Samantha Reyes
quote: I found a graphing calculator for half the price—total lifesaver.

name: Marcus Chen
quote: The interface is clean and intuitive. I listed my books in minutes.

quote: I love the free section—picked up a desk lamp and a chair for nothing!

quote: It’s great to have a student-only marketplace. Feels safe and legit.

quote: I wish I had this during my first year. So many deals I missed!

name: Carlos Rivera
quote: Sold my old laptop and got enough to buy a new one. Win-win.

quote: The messaging feature makes it easy to coordinate pickups.
